summary: A government investigator tries to find out the truth behind the break-in at a top secret research facility.
cast: George Peppard|Michael Sarrazin|Christine Belford|Cliff Potts|James Olson|Tim O'Connor|James McEachin|Alan Oppenheimer|Roger Dressler|Ty Haller|Anna Hagan|Hagan Beggs|John Destry|Milos Zatovic|Don Granbery|Robin Coller|Bob Meneray|Richard Sergeant|Ed Collier|Mitch Mitchell|Martin Moore|Don Vance|William Nunn|Peter Lavender|Barry Cahill
title: Las dos caras del miedo
